feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
